title: INS'hAck 2018
description: Usually a series of 3 talks about general infosec topics followed by an onsite and online CTF. The event is hosted by InSecurity, a student society based at university INSA Lyon (France). Talks are in French, there are prizes for onsite CTF winners and free pizza for all onsite contestants !
address: INSA Lyon, 20 avenue Albert Einstein, 69100 Villeurbanne
